document.full_text: in sana, the yemeni capital, government supporters attacked demonstrators at a continuing three-week protest with rocks, daggers and automatic weapons, witnesses said.
document.title: clashes erupt as protests continue in yemen?s capital
lines_and_colors: in sana, the yemeni capital, government supporters attacked demonstrators at a continuing three-week protest with rocks, daggers and automatic weapons, witnesses said.
